channel.title: Full Pk Server-Will rep++
channel.description: Hey,so i've made a pk world,and i was wondering if anyone could give me a tutorial or whatever that explains how i make it all pk?Because i used an economy world as the base,but obviously i want pk everywhere,not just the wilderness. Thanks!
